assertion.value: The authors declare no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for publication was obtained from the patient.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: As this case report is not categorized as human research, there was no need of local ethics committee approval for its publication. Acceptable anonymity was achieved, and HIPAA identifiers are not available in the manuscript.
